title: Katex (Block)
description: Insert katex to render math formulas.

fields.name: selection
fields.title: Katex: Specify your math or chemistry markup here.

fields.name: as_figure
fields.title: Render as Figure: Whether the rendered KaTeX should be added in a figure element.

fields.name: caption
fields.title: Caption: Specify Markdown for the figure's caption. Implies `as_figure` is true.

fields.name: caption_position
fields.title: Caption Position: Whether the figure caption should be added above or below the rendered markup. Ignored if no caption is specified.

fields.name: class
fields.title: Class List: Specify any classes to add to the block in a space separated list.

fields.name: display
fields.title: Display Mode: Whether KaTeX should render the markup in display mode.

fields.name: id
fields.title: ID: Specify an ID to add to the rendered markup so the formula is directly linkable.
